inclusion.criterion: Continuous worsening of hip pain with an onset of minimum 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hip Pain intensity >40mm on a visual analogue scale (VAS) ranging from 0 (no pain) to 100mm (maximal pain) during weight bearing for the last 7 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hip OA fulfilling the ACR (American College of Rheumatology) criteria [33]
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Will and able to consent and comply with the study protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: eGFR (estimated glomerular filtration rate) < 35 ml/min or hypocalcemia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Exposure to any treatment affecting bone other than Ca+D ( bisphosphonates, Denosumab teriparatide or continuous treatment of prednisolone)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Bisphosphonate will be started as first-line therapy

exclusion.criterion: Diseases affecting bone and joints (i.e inflammatory joint diseases, osteonecrosis with segmental collapse and deformation, primary bone cancer or known skeletal metastases)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe vitamin D deficiency (S-25(OH)D < 25 nmol/l) has to be supplemented with Ca+D before zoledronic acid infusion
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Women of child bearing potential (WOCBP). Female participants must be in a postmenopausal state or permanent sterile.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hypersensitivity or previous allergic reaction to ZA or other bisphosphonates
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be started on Bisphosphonate as first-line therapy.
